meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Billy Wong Abigail Myers Eric Vernon Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7501.

td.p: Billy Wong, an adjunct professor from Hacienda Heights, California
Abigail Myers, an education administrator from Brooklyn, New York
Eric Vernon, a retired government relations specialist from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada (whose 2-day cash winnings total $50,400)

tr.td: NEW WAYS TO SAY CORRECT
(Alex: I'm trying to discover new ways.)
TIME SPANS
THE ROCK & ROLL QUINTET
KING ME
"O" BROTHER
WHERE ART THOU?

Billy
')

Abigail

CONSTELLATIONS

AT THE "END"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_2_4', 'clue_DJ_2_4_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew presents an astronomical diagram on the monitor.) Though it reaches into the zodiac, the constellation Ophiuchus is not one of the traditional zodiac signs; with a name meaning "serpent holder", it represents this son of Apollo, the Greek god of medicine, who is often depicted holding a serpent')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew presents an astronomical diagram on the monitor.) Though it reaches into the zodiac, the constellation Ophiuchus is not one of the traditional zodiac signs; with a name meaning "serpent holder", it represents this son of Apollo, the Greek god of medicine, who is often depicted holding a serpent
